io.socket.socketio.server

Class SocketIoMemoryAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.socket.engineio.server.Emitter
      • io.socket.socketio.server.SocketIoAdapter
        • io.socket.socketio.server.SocketIoMemoryAdapter

  • public final class SocketIoMemoryAdapter
extends SocketIoAdapter
    In-memory adapter class. This is the default adapter used.

    • Method Detail

      • broadcast

        public void broadcast(Packet packet,
                      String[] rooms,
                      String[] socketsExcluded)
               throws IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from class: SocketIoAdapter
        Broadcast a packet to all sockets or sockets that have joined specified rooms. Optionally, specify sockets to exclude from sending.
        Specified by:
        broadcast in class SocketIoAdapter
        Parameters:
        packet - Packet to broadcast.
        rooms - List of rooms to restrict packet to or null to send to all rooms.
        socketsExcluded - List of sockets to exclude from sending or null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If packet is null.
